# Future Idea Template

> Singleton document template — when you set up `docs/project/future-ideas.md`, start with this file, and reuse the sections below whenever you capture a new idea in that shared log.

- **Idea title:**
- **Created by:**
- **Date:**
- **Idea type:** New feature ▢ / Existing feature update ▢

## Problem / Opportunity

- What pain or opportunity sparked this idea?
- Who experiences it and how often?

## Signals & Inputs

- User feedback, metrics, research notes, or competitive insights that support the idea.

## Sketch of the Outcome

- Desired change in user behaviour or system capability.
- Rough notes on how it might work (optional).

## Open Questions / Next Steps

- Unknowns to validate, experiments to run, or artefacts to draft before promoting to the backlog.
